Demoralize.effect: Demoralize now calls on the power of an Ancient to charge toward you from a targeted location, bringing along any enemies in its path. Damage +18.0%
Demoralize becomes an Ancestral Protector, granting an absorb shield that makes you immune to knockback while active. Shield effect +10.8%
Demoralize replaced with an intimidating shout that damages enemies and reduces their attack/move speeds. Damage +18.0%
Demoralize replaced with a terrifying roar that damages/Immobilizes nearby enemies. Damage +18.0%
Demoralize unleashes a roar that damages enemies while making you immune to loss of control and knockbacks. Damage +18.0%
Demoralize now pulls in all nearby enemies, dealing damage, Stunning them, and removing beneficial effects applied by Skills or Primaries. Damage +18.0%
Demoralize now knocks back and damages enemies; those knocked into walls are also Stunned. Damage +18.0%
Demoralize replaced with a war cry that increases all damage you and nearby allies inflict. Cooldown -7.2%
Demoralize also detonates DoTs on nearby enemies instantly. Demoralize Cooldown -3.6%
Also grants a Demoralizing Aura for 3s, reducing nearby enemies’ damage by 19%.

Sprint.effect: Sprint also leaves tornadoes (7,650 dmg) in your path. Damage +90.0%
While Sprint is active, your Attack Speed increases by 28.5% and projectile speed by 40%.
Sprint also increases your Dodge Chance by 20%. Cooldown -3.6%.
Sprint leaves a trail of flames dealing 19,040 dmg over 4s. Damage +90.0%
Sprint leaves a wind tunnel letting allies pass through for +30% Move Speed (2s). Sprint Cooldown -3.6%.
Sprint causes you to run continuously, knocking away and damaging enemies in your path. Sprint Damage increased by 18.0%.
Sprint also increases movement speed of nearby allies; Sprint Cooldown reduced by 7.2%.

Undying Rage.effect: Taking damage during Undying Rage triggers a 5,882 dmg counterattack (once per 0.5s). Damage +90.0%
Undying Rage also increases your Movement Speed by 50%. Cooldown -3.6%

Ground Stomp.effect: +1 max charge for Ground Stomp, Cooldown -3.6%
Ground Stomp unleashes fury within you, Burning enemies. Ground Stomp Damageincreased by 18.0%.
Ground Stomp now affects all nearby enemies. Ground Stomp Damage increased by 18.0%.
Ground Stomp rips open the ground in front of you, dealing damage; max 2 charges. Ground Stomp Damage increased by 18.0%.
Smashes the ground to erect a ring of rocks, boosting your damage and reducing enemy damage inside; Ground Stomp Cooldown reduced by 7.2%.
Also causes lava to erupt after a short delay, damaging and Stunning enemies. Ground Stomp Damage +18.0%.
Calls on the power of an Ancient to appear and stomp periodically around you. Ground Stomp Damage +18.0%.
Produces an earthquake damaging enemies in the area but no longer Stuns them. Ground Stomp Damage +18.0%.

Wrath Of The Berserker.effect: Slaying enemies during WotB increases your damage by 1% for 9.6s, up to 10%.
During WotB, your Critical Hit Chance is increased by 19%.
WotB also increases your Primary Attack Speed by 30% for 5.7s.
Wrath of the Berserker duration increased by 39%.
WotB now also dispels loss-of-control effects. Cooldown -3.6%
WotB also causes your Primary Attack to deal 100% of its damage to nearby enemies. Cooldown -3.6%
WotB also makes you immune to knockback effects for 4.75s.
WotB causes Primary Attacks to consume 1% Life, dealing +13,601 damage each strike. Damage +90.0%
Activating WotB immediately reduces nearby enemies’ Move Speed by 80% for 2s. WotB Cooldown -3.6%.
During WotB, each Critical Hit reduces its cooldown by 0.6s, up to 3.6s total.
WotB also grants a 6s shield that absorbs 37,743 damage. Shield Effect +54.0%.
Causes you to retaliate when attacked, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Damage +18.0%
Also enrages you when near a Bleeding enemy, increasing your damage by 28.5%.
WotB now increases Critical Hit Chance instead of Attack Speed. WotB Cooldownreduced by 7.2%.
WotB now causes nearby enemies to Burn. WotB Damage +18.0%
WotB becomes a brawler’s rage: your Primary Attacks are punches; the 3rd punch grabs an enemy and throws them forward for AoE damage. WotB Damage +18.0%

Hammer Of The Ancients.effect: HotA deals up to +76% additional damage the farther away enemies are.
When HotA hits an enemy, drop additional hammers (50% damage), once every 3s. Damage increased by 90.0%
+1 max charge for HotA; Hammer of the Ancients cooldown reduced by 3.6%.
For each negative condition on an enemy, HotA damage +19% (up to +76%).
After using HotA, gain +20% Attack Speed for 6.4 seconds.
Shatters Frozen enemies for 34,512 extra damage, applying Chill. Damage increased by 90.0%.
Hammer of the Ancients deals +66.5% damage vs. Stunned enemies.
HotA becomes electrified, slowing enemies by 50% for 3.2s.
HotA Damage +19%
HotA smashes the ground, leaving an unstable area that erupts for extra damage after a delay. Damage +18.0%
Rains hammers from the sky at your location, damaging enemies within the area. Damage +18.0%
Randomly drops hammers multiple times in the targeted area. Damage +18.0%
Can be charged for more range/damage; deals +50% vs. Stunned foes. Damage +18.0%
HotA can be dropped at a targeted spot; when reactivated, you and the hammer rush together—gathering enemies in between. Damage +18.0%
HotA now orbits you for several seconds, damaging enemies it passes through. Damage +18.0%
Each of your other attacks charges HotA, increasing its damage/radius on use. Damage +18.0%
HotA creates a barrier of earth, preventing enemies from entering or exiting the strike zone. Damage +18.0%
Throws a whirling hammer that returns to you, damaging enemies in its path. Damage +18.0%
Throws a giant hammer that knocks enemies away; picking it up reduces HotA’s remaining cooldown. Damage +18.0%
Summons a Spirit of the Ancients who stuns nearby enemies on arrival and fights alongside you. Damage +18.0%
HotA strikes the ground multiple times, knocking enemies airborne. Movement speed is reduced while striking. Damage +18.0%

Sunder (Via Primary Attacks).effect: Primary Attacks extend Sunder’s duration by 1.6s each (up to 4.8s), also boosting its damage bonus by 3% per stack (max 9%).

Grab.effect: Grab shatters the enemy’s armor, causing them to take +19% damage for 3s.

Grab now causes you to charge forward and seize the first enemy you hit, carrying them before leaping and slamming them down—damaging and Slowing nearby enemies. You’re immune to loss-of-control and knockback during the skill. Grab Damage +18.0%
Grab calls an Ancestral Spirit to hurl a giant mountain at a target location, damaging and Stunning enemies. Grab Damage +18.0%
Grab now targets an enemy and dashes toward them, seizing and continuing the dash—knocking back other foes. Stuns if you hit a wall. Grab Damage +18.0%

Chained Spear.effect: Sweeps spears from left/right, gathering enemies in a cluster in front of you. Chained Spear damage +18.0%.
Hurls 3 harpoons that knock enemies away and Stun them. Damage +18.0%.
Now throws a piercing spear that applies a stacking Bleed. Damage +18.0%.
Hurls 3 electrified spears that damage and immobilize enemies. Damage +18.0%.
Hurls 3 flaming spears, each leaving a burning trail. Damage +18.0%.
Hurls giant rocks, damaging all enemies in their path. Chained Spear Damage +18.0%.
Chained Spear also shatters armor, increasing all damage enemies take by 8% for 4.8 seconds.
Chained Spear also increases your damage by 19% for 3 seconds.
+1 max charge for Chained Spear; Chained Spear Cooldown reduced by 3.6%.
Chained Spear marks enemies for 5s and heals you for 5% of damage caused to marked enemies.
Chained Spear hurls 2 additional spears. Cooldown reduced by 3.6%.

Whirlwind.effect: Whirlwind damage +19% per Bleed on the enemy, up to +57%.
Whirlwind occasionally spawns tornadoes (8,415 dmg). Damage increased by 90.0%
Whirlwind pulls in all enemies it hits. Whirlwind Energy Consumption -3.6%.
Whirlwind shreds armor, +2% damage taken per hit (stack up to 5x). Whirlwind Energy Consumption -3.6%.
Each time you’re attacked, Whirlwind’s Critical Hit Chance +12% for 2s (up to +36%).
Whirlwind makes enemies more vulnerable, increasing Crit Chance against them by 4.8% for 3s, up to 24%.
Striking the same enemy 3 times with Whirlwind causes them to Bleed for 18,936 dmg/s over 2.5s. Damage +90.0%.
+50% chance to block projectiles during Whirlwind; Whirlwind Energy Consumption -3.6%.
Whirlwind reduces all damage you take by 20% while channeling. Whirlwind Energy Consumption -3.6%.
Whirlwind now lets you spin and charge forward, damaging all enemies in your path. Max 3 charges. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%
Whirlwind radius increased; Whirlwind movement speed decreased. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%
Whirlwind consumes Life instead of Energy, letting you spin as long as you have HP. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%
Whirlwind now shatters armor and gains significantly increased Attack Speed. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%
Whirlwind also inflicts a stacking Chill. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%
Whirlwind draws on the wind for increased damage without reducing your Movement Speed. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%

Furious Charge.effect: All damage you deal is increased by +19% after activating Furious Charge.
Creates shock waves when colliding with walls, dealing 8,500 dmg and Stunning enemies for 1s. Damage increased by 90.0%.
Decreases all damage you take by 5% for 3s per enemy hit, stacking up to 6 times. Furious Charge Cooldown -3.6%.
Also shatters enemies’ armor, increasing damage they take by 19% for 3s.
Furious Charge now also reduces enemies’ Movement Speed by 50% for 6.4s.
Furious Charge can now be charged to increase its range and damage. Furious Charge Damage increased by 18.0%.
Furious Charge drags enemies with you, Stunning them. Furious Charge Damageincreased by 18.0%.
Furious Charge now dashes to a targeted enemy, damaging and Stunning all nearby enemies. Furious Charge Damage increased by 18.0%.
Furious Charge goes to a location, knocking enemies into the air; max 2 charges. Furious Charge Damage +18.0%.

Cleave.effect: Cleave’s knockback can now affect enemy players (once every 2s). Cleave Cooldownreduced by 3.6%.
Cleave can be used while suffering loss of control or knockback effects, and grants brief immunity to those effects. Cleave Cooldown -3.6%.
Cleave deals +47.5% damage to Slowed enemies.
Cleave damage +29% vs. Chilled enemies, +50% vs. Frozen.
Cleave tears armor, increasing damage enemies take by 11.4% for 3s, up to 34.2%.
Each time Cleave hits an enemy within 2s, it gains +19% damage vs. that enemy, up to +57%.
Cleave’s Bleed now spreads to 2 nearby enemies when it expires. Cleave Cooldown -3.6%.
Cleave periodically conjures a Spirit of the Ancient to cleave through nearby enemies. Cleave Damage +18.0%
Cleave now strikes in a full circle around you. Cleave Damage +18.0%
Cleave now hurls two whirling axes to damage enemies. Cleave Damage +18.0%
Cleave becomes a 3-attack sequence (Bleed + knockup) without multiple charges. Cleave Damage +18.0%
Cleave summons twin rime axes orbiting you, damaging and freezing Chilled enemies. Cleave Damage +18.0%
Cleave now causes you to Dash forward, slicing all enemies in your path. Cleave Damage +18.0%
Cleave becomes channeled, repeatedly damaging all enemies in front of you. Cleave Damage +18.0%
Enemies killed by Cleave explode, dealing 8,925 damage to nearby enemies. Damage +90.0%

Leap.effect: Leap can be charged to increase range/damage. Leap Damage +18.0%.
Leap is electrified, Stunning all nearby enemies on landing. Leap Damage +18.0%.
Leap grants a 37,683-damage shield and knockback immunity while active. Shield Effectincreased by 54.0%.
Activating Leap increases your Critical Hit Chance by 19% for 3 seconds.
Leap also increases your Attack Speed by 28.5% for 3 seconds.
After using Leap, your damage is increased by 19% for 4 seconds.
Leap now knocks enemies into the air when landing. Leap Cooldown -3.6%.
Max charges of Leap +1; Leap Cooldown -3.6%.
Leap causes the ground to shake for 3s, dealing 22,752 total damage to enemies in the area. Damage +90.0%

Sunder.effect: Sunder now also pulls enemies to you. Sunder Cooldown reduced by 3.6%.

Lacerate.effect: Lacerate inflicts a Bleeding of 28,856 damage over 3s. Damage +90.0%
Lacerate’s Attack Speed +15% for 3.2s each time you take damage, stacking to +45%.

Frenzy.effect: When Frenzy is fully stacked, each attack unleashes 9,792 damage to all enemies in front of you (0.4s cooldown). Damage +90.0%
Movement Speed +15% while Frenzy is at max stacks. Frenzy Damage +9.0%
When Frenzy Crits, your Attack Speed is +50% for 3.2s.
Frenzy increases the damage you deal to that enemy by 6% for 3s, stacking up to 30%. Frenzy Damage +9.0%
